summary:
This pack contains 3 additional warpaints (they do NOT replace any existing warpaints) with famous designs of Norwegian black metal band Immortal, as well as a matching white skin tone.

Included are the facepaint of Abbath, Demonaz and Horgh.
descriptionHtml:
LATEST UPDATE: 
- Fixed a bug that would cause the warpaint to be selected when you bring up the character menu, overlaying all warpaints until you had cycled through the list once.


Also on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=20554575

These warpaints work for Nords, Bretons, Redguard, Imperials and Wood Elves.

How to use:

To change the warpaint of an existing character mid-game, bring up the console (this depends on your keyboard layout, possible keys include ^,°,~ and §). Select the included white skin tone and pick your warpaint. Please save your progress before making any changes.


Got a request? Leave a comment!

Changelog:

0.5 - Accidentally covered project files in permafrost

1.0 - Defrosted release on Steam Workshop and Nexus
author: Johnnsen
